text: What a frightful event! he wrote. 'I tremble! What infatuation! Personally I am. indifferent, but I really tremble for my country! I may be mistaken, 1tho' I cannot but that the Commons House upon a dissolution, which must be had, will be a mass of Radicalism, & then God knows what may happen... Nreuble! What infatuatiou! Penounlly 1 Me Mstale ConN 1Ho' I camnot but fear Hha1 Mhe Lxrpahior of He Beoyle will be so Sohuion, whicl mmst le had? will le a unon of Rlicaiou,& Her Jo huows slt uny
